analysis: The project requires an Egyptian-themed UI with a light color palette, desert-inspired elements, mobile responsiveness, and clean design. The existing files need to be updated to reflect these themes, ensuring all buttons are functional and the navigation is mobile-friendly.

improvements.description: Update the CSS to include an Egyptian-themed color palette with light desert colors, such as sandy beige, golden yellow, and deep blue accents. Ensure the design is clean and modern.
Ensure the HTML structure supports a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon and that all buttons are properly linked and functional.
Update the JavaScript to implement smooth mobile menu toggle functionality with proper event handling and user-friendly interactions.
